unnormalised: India scored 336/5 in their 50 overs against Pakistan in the 2019 World Cup match. Rohit Sharma scored 140 runs off 113 balls. Pakistan, in reply, were all out for 212. The match result was India won by 89 runs (DLS method). The man of the match was awarded to Rohit Sharma. The highest individual score in IPL 2023 was 128 runs.
normalised: India scored three hundred and thirty six for five in their fifty overs against Pakistan in the two thousand and nineteen World Cup match. Rohit Sharma scored one hundred and forty runs off one hundred and thirteen balls. Pakistan, in reply, were all out for two hundred and twelve. The match result was India won by eighty nine runs (D-L-S method). The man of the match was awarded to Rohit Sharma. The highest individual score in I-P-L two thousand and twenty three was one hundred and twenty eight runs.
